author: dapplion
content:
We are cutting a Lodestar release today, would like feedback on which mainnet config params should we include if any
- BELLATRIX_FORK_EPOCH: appears unlikely to chance, would be inclined to include in the release
- TERMINAL_TOTAL_DIFFICULTY: better to not include until confirmation next week?

author: ralexstokes
content: sounds reasonable, but may also be easier to just wait until you know for certain

author: ralexstokes
content: sounds messy if you did need to rollback knowing that one version of lodestar would fork users
